CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 9, 1952, pg. 27 reads: "Mr. Slug - That's the name that followers of the Terrace Village baseball team have put on hard-hitting Norman Gant. Gant, who plays rightfield for the Villagers, is currently hitting over the .350 mark.  Besides attracting attention from several major league baseball scouts the former Fifth Avenue high School athlete is considered the top man in his position in Greater Pittsburgh League. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Terrace Village "Villagers" baseball player Norman Gant, posed in batting stance, on Kennard Field
